synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: InCl3 (0.1106 g, 0.5 mmol), 2-aminoterephthalic acid (0.092 g, 0.5 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Transferred and stored in fresh DMF
Soaking SHF-61-DMF in dry CHCl3, replaced daily for a minimum of one week

synthesis_conditions.time: Until mass losses correspond well to those expected for solvent removal
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Under high vacuum at specified temperature
